snippet.title: Bye Sweet Carole - Official Animated Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description:
What begins as a seemingly charming scene quickly turns a bit creepy in this animated trailer for Bye Sweet Carole, an upcoming narrative game. In Bye Sweet Carole, young Lana Benton, pushed by the gelid Old Hat man, must confront bizarre creatures in a mysterious dream garden as she follows the last traces of Carole, a girl who escaped from Bunny Hall, a 19th-century girls' orphanage infested with wild rabbits. Bye Sweet Carole will be available on PC, PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch.

#IGN #Gaming
